start.text: The sun rises over the sleepy village of Eldenbrook. $$name wakes to the sound of a bell tolling in the distance. Today is the day of the Choosing.

village_square.text: $$name arrives at the bustling square. Villagers gather around the ancient stone where destinies are foretold. The elder beckons.

forest_path.text: $$name steps off the road into the shaded woods. The trees whisper with the wind. A faint trail winds deeper into the forest.

elder_speaks.text: The elder places a hand on $$name's shoulder. 'I see a fork in your fate,' he says. 'Light or shadow, the path is yours.'

quiet_exit.text: You step back from the crowd, unnoticed. The road home is quiet, but something nags at you — a chance left unexplored.

forest_clearing.text: The path opens into a clearing bathed in golden light. A stag stands silently, watching you with deep, intelligent eyes.

path_light.text: The elder smiles faintly. 'The path of light leads to sacrifice and service, but also to joy beyond the veil.'

path_shadow.text: The elder’s eyes darken. 'The path of shadow offers power, but it comes at a cost few can bear.'

stag_encounter.text: The stag speaks, not with words but with thoughts. 'You are not bound by the village's fate. Choose your own legend.'

watch_stag.text: You watch in silence. The stag bows once, then vanishes into mist. A sense of peace washes over you.

initiation_light.text: $$name kneels as the elder places the silver cord around your neck. The sky brightens. You are now a Warden of the Light.

initiation_shadow.text: Darkness coils around your hand as you accept the elder’s mark. You are now a Walker of the Veil. Power hums in your veins.

ending_guardian.text: $$name takes the stag’s blessing. Seasons pass, and you become a guardian of the deep woods, known only in hushed tales.

ending_home.text: You live a quiet life, untouched by magic or fate. But sometimes, in dreams, you hear a stag’s call in the distance.
